findings.details: Section anchor jumps on long pages can land under the sticky header on mobile; add scroll-margin-top to section anchors.
Checked key templates and page links; no broken internal references observed.
Homepage can prefetch high-intent routes to reduce perceived navigation latency.
Recent daily posts are present; no placeholder content identified in templates.

recommendations: Add scroll-margin-top for section anchors to avoid sticky header overlap
Prefetch /blog and /contact from the homepage to speed up first navigation
